title: PDAle
author: PDAle
content: Hi everyone!Was searching for, but didn't found any community of those, who run crypto-nodes.Where it possible to discuss technical issues, talk about promising projects and so on.To start the topic, as for me - running: - Aptos Node; - Subspace network; - Sei network.Have nearly just started.May be somebody researched interesting upcoming projects?

comments.author: PDAle
comments.body: So today Aptos sent notifications to 100 validators for testnet? Did anybody got in?
